title: Diamond and Ruby Floral Raasi Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Premium Oval Cut Rubies. Expertly crafted with a fine Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: A delicate floral design featuring intricately set diamonds forming stylized flowers and vines. The vibrant rubies are meticulously bezel-set, adding a touch of regal elegance. The necklace showcases a modern aesthetic while retaining a touch of traditional Raasi Haaram design with its floral motifs. The floral connectors are studded with diamonds to create a continuous flow.
occasions: and sophisticated evening events. This versatile piece can also be worn for a Seemantham ceremony or a milestone birthday celebration.
description: This exquisite Raasi Haaram beautifully blends modern design with traditional South Indian sensibilities. The brilliant diamonds and vibrant rubies create a striking contrast, enhancing the necklace's overall appeal. The fine Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and unparalleled durability. This is a statement piece that will be cherished for generations, a true heirloom in the making.
